intro: Hello world! I am Chris, a Full Stack Engineer with a passion for building scalable, performant, and user-friendly applications. With a background in both front-end and back-end development, I strive to create seamless digital experiences that drive value and impact. I hold a Bachelor of Science in Software Development from Western Governors University.
introHeader: Full stack engineer, problem solver, and a builder of things.
about: Hello world! My name is Chris, and I am an experienced software engineer with a passion for building scalable, performant, and user-friendly applications. With a background in both front-end and back-end development, I strive to create seamless digital experiences that drive value and impact.

Growing up I had always had a passion for taking things apart, breaking stuff, and figuring out how to put things back together again. I’ve been driven by an insatiable curiosity and a need to understand the how and the why things work. It's how I’ve always lived. The joy of learning and quest for knowledge fuels me.

As a creative, I love designing beautiful experiences and elegant software solutions. Whether it be music, art, or technology, I just love to make things. I take great pleasure in the process of transforming visions into reality and bringing dreams to life.
I am also a natural problem solver and I get a lot of gratification in thinking up solutions and solving difficult problems.

Off the clock, I'm a gamer, a nerd, and a professional hobby collector. I'm always on the lookout for new adventures and opportunities. If you're interested in collaborating, learning more about my work, or just want to chat, feel free to reach out or connect with me on LinkedIn.
harmonyhitLeadHighlights: Leader of the Core team, balancing feature development and development support across the full suite of company products, spanning multiple technologies and stacks.
Oversee all stages of product development from MVP to production, with a focus on building reliable, maintainable systems within a Service-Oriented Architecture.
Lead technical investigations (spikes) to de-risk unknowns and contribute architectural direction based on comprehensive understanding of product capabilities and long-term goals.
harmonyhitHighlights: Support an AngularJS application with Java/Kotlin Spring Boot backend.
Maintain several RabbitMQ microservices, built with Java, Kotlin, and Spring.
amerisaveHighlights: Develop and maintain RESTful APIs in a distributed environment using Java, Spring Boot, TypeScript, NestJS/Fastify and MSSQL.
Supported primary customer facing website built with Vue/Quasar, integrated with a Spring Boot/JPA backend.
Successfully transitioned from legacy Firebase authentication provider to Auth0.
Extended JSON configuration capabilities to support more common user flows, cutting down development time for new requirements by 75%
